def is_palindrome(N):
    div = 1
    while N / div >= 10:
        div = div * 10
    while N:      
        if N / div != N % 10:
            return False
        N = ( N % div ) / 10
        div = div / 100
    return True    

def get_palindrome(N):
    return int(str(N)[::-1])

def dpc206():
    N = int(raw_input())
    for n in xrange(N):
        P = int(raw_input())
        count = 0
        while not is_palindrome(P):
            P = P + get_palindrome(P)
            count += 1
        print count, P

if __name__ == "__main__":
    dpc206()
